intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product, which delivers detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) data for over 4,700 grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe, covering the years 2006, 2012, and 2018. The manual provides a comprehensive overview of the product, encompassing its characteristics, methodology, workflows, potential use cases, and quality assessment, thereby guiding users in effectively leveraging this high-resolution satellite data for monitoring and assessing habitat conservation status and associated land cover changes.
